item.title: Solving The Android Permissions And Malware Puzzle
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: There has been a spate of security reports recently about Android apps being malware or suspicious. Most of these were found baseless but at least one was indeed correct (e.g. The Russian Trojan app). We also know that Android has a very good security model but even then, the rest of the reports also makes one think and focus on why an apps requires the permissions that it states it needs?
